title: The mastery system.
body:
Hi alll!

Just a quick question. I carried a game just before with a yasuo as my wing-man, he got an S from the mastery system and I got an A+.

My logic dictates I should have got the S an he the A since I carried harder. Im a little confounded about the outcome.

My score was: 22/4/4

My friends Score: 12/5/1

Can someone explain to me how to get more S's and why I may not have gotten one this match and previous matches?

Cheers,

JJ

replies.body:
Mostly it's because it's based on the server's Stats on the champion.

Corki tends to have an easier time getting a high KDA (especially low deaths) as his currently extremely strong, while Yasuo tends to be a hit or miss champion, meaning he would have an easier time getting an S.

Having a look through your match history your tending to play champs that are actually in a category that you have to do extremely well to actually hit them S marks. (Vayne, Corki, Yi, Lee, GP)

Simply because they are high damage carry champs, it's a lot harder to hit them S marks on them without a massive stomp of a game that is mostly you carrying the entire game.

Ahh thanks for the info!

So if im getting this right, the grading system is based on how well those champions are performing in the region, and playing lesser tier champs will give a better chance at an S?

Well I guess ill have to start playing some off meta champs and see how I go lol
It kinda depends on the champion, if it's a champion that has only die hard mains playing them, then they might be hard, but yes the more off meta champs tend to be the easier one's.
